intro: Psychotria sphaeroidea, commonly known as the spherical Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and produces clusters of small, white to greenish flowers. Its fruits are typically small berries that turn red when mature. Psychotria sphaeroidea is often found in humid, shaded environments such as rainforests and is sometimes cultivated for its ornamental value.
